verses.name: Luke 1:50
verses.text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation.

verses.name: Luke 1:51
verses.text: He hath shewed strength with his arm; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts.

verses.name: Luke 1:52
verses.text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats, and exalted them of low degree.

verses.name: Luke 1:53
verses.text: He hath filled the hungry with good things; and the rich he hath sent empty away.

verses.name: Luke 1:54
verses.text: He hath holpen his servant Israel, in remembrance of his mercy;

verses.name: Luke 1:55
verses.text: As he spake to our fathers, to Abraham, and to his seed for ever.
